   19: %%
   20: -module(dialyzer_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   24: 
   25: %% Default timetrap timeout (set in init_per_testcase).
   26: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(10)).
   27: -define(application, dialyzer).
   28: 
   29: %% Test server specific exports
   30: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   31: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   32: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   33: 
   34: %% Test cases must be exported.
   35: -export([app_test/1, appup_test/1]).
   36: -export([cplt_info/1, iplt_info/1,
   37:          incremental_plt_given_to_classic_mode/1,
   38:          classic_plt_given_to_incremental_mode/1,
   39:          if_output_plt_is_missing_incremental_mode_makes_it/1,
   40:          file_list/1]).
   41: 
   42: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   43: 
   44: all() ->
   45:     [app_test, appup_test, cplt_info, iplt_info,
   46:      incremental_plt_given_to_classic_mode,
   47:      classic_plt_given_to_incremental_mode,
   48:      if_output_plt_is_missing_incremental_mode_makes_it,
   49:      file_list].
   50: 
   51: groups() ->
   52:     [].
   53: 
   54: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   58:     ok.
   59: 
   60: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: 
   67: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   68:     Dog=test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   69:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   70: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   71:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   72:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   73:     ok.
   74: 
   75: compile(Config, Prog, Module, CompileOpts) ->
   76:     Source = lists:concat([Module, ".erl"]),
   77:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
   78:     Filename = filename:join([PrivDir, Source]),
   79:     ok = file:write_file(Filename, Prog),
   80:     Opts = [{outdir, PrivDir}, debug_info | CompileOpts],
   81:     {ok, Module} = compile:file(Filename, Opts),
   82:     {ok, filename:join([PrivDir, lists:concat([Module, ".beam"])])}.
   83: 
   84: %%%
   85: %%% Test cases starts here.
   86: %%%
   87: 
   88: app_test(doc) ->
   89:     ["Test that the .app file does not contain any `basic' errors"];
   90: app_test(suite) ->
   91:     [];
   92: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   93:     test_server:app_test(dialyzer).
   94: 
   95: %% Test that the .appup file does not contain any `basic' errors
   96: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   97:     ok = test_server:appup_test(dialyzer).
   98: 
   99: cplt_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  100:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  101:     Prog1 =
  102:       <<"-module(foo).
  103: 
  104:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  105:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  106: 
  107:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "cplt_info.plt"),
  108:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
  109:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  110:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  111:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  112: 
  113:     {ok, [{files, [Beam1]}]} = dialyzer:plt_info(Plt1).
  114: 
  115: iplt_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  117:     Prog1 =
  118:       <<"-module(foo).
  119: 
  120:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  121:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  122: 
  123:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "iplt_info.plt"),
  124:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, incremental},
  125:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  126:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  127:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  128: 
  129:     {ok, {incremental, [{modules, [foo]}]}} = dialyzer:plt_info(Plt1).
  130: 
  131: incremental_plt_given_to_classic_mode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  132:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  133:     Prog1 =
  134:       <<"-module(foo).
  135: 
  136:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  137:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  138: 
  139:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "my_incremental.iplt"),
  140:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, incremental},
  141:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  142:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  143:                        {output_plt, Plt1},
  144:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  145: 
  146:     ?assertException(throw, {dialyzer_error, "Given file is an incremental PLT file, but outside of incremental mode, a classic PLT file is expected: {init_plt_file," ++ _ },
  147:                  dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_check},
  148:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  149:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  150:                        {from, byte_code}])).
  151: 
  152: classic_plt_given_to_incremental_mode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  153:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  154:     Prog1 =
  155:       <<"-module(foo).
  156: 
  157:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  158:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  159: 
  160:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "my_classic.plt"),
  161:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
  162:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  163:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  164:                        {output_plt, Plt1},
  165:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  166: 
  167:     ?assertException(throw, {dialyzer_error, "Given file is a classic PLT file, but in incremental mode, an incremental PLT file is expected: {init_plt_file," ++ _ },
  168:                  dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, incremental},
  169:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  170:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  171:                        {from, byte_code}])).
  172: 
  173: if_output_plt_is_missing_incremental_mode_makes_it(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  175:     Prog1 =
  176:       <<"-module(foo).
  177: 
  178:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  179:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  180: 
  181:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "brand_new.iplt"),
  182:     ?assertMatch(false, filelib:is_regular(Plt1)),
  183: 
  184:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, incremental},
  185:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  186:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  187:                        {output_plt, Plt1},
  188:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  189: 
  190:     ?assertMatch(true, filelib:is_regular(Plt1)).
  191: 
  192: file_list(Config) ->
  193:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  194: 
  195:     case dialyzer_common:check_plt(PrivDir) of
  196:         fail -> ct:fail("Plt creation/check failed");
  197:         ok -> ok
  198:     end,
  199: 
  200:     Files = generate_modules(PrivDir, 26),
  201:     ListFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "list_of_files"),
  202:     ok = file:write_file(ListFile, [lists:join("\n", Files), "\n"]),
  203: 
  204:     Expected = expected(Files),
  205:     ExpectedFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "expected"),
  206:     ok = file:write_file(ExpectedFile, Expected),
  207: 
  208:     Plt = dialyzer_common:plt_file(PrivDir),
  209:     Result = os:cmd("dialyzer --plt " ++ Plt ++ " -q --src --input_list_file " ++ ListFile),
  210:     ResultFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "result"),
  211:     ok = file:write_file(ResultFile, Result),
  212: 
  213:     case file_utils:diff(ResultFile, ExpectedFile) of
  214:         same ->
  215:             ok;
  216:         Diff ->
  217:             io:format("~p\n", [Diff]),
  218:             ct:fail(unexpected_result)
  219:     end.
  220: 
  221: generate_modules(_Dir, 0) ->
  222:     [];
  223: generate_modules(Dir, N) ->
  224:     Name = "module_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  225:     File = filename:join(Dir, Name ++ ".erl"),
  226:     Code = <<"-module(",(list_to_binary(Name))/binary,").\n",
  227:              "-export([main/1]).\n",
  228:              "main(L) ->\n",
  229:              "  case list_to_atom(L) of\n",
  230:              "    Atom when is_atom(Atom) -> {ok,Atom};\n",
  231:              "    _ -> error\n",
  232:              "  end.\n"
  233:            >>,
  234:     ok = file:write_file(File, Code),
  235:     [File|generate_modules(Dir, N - 1)].
  236: 
  237: expected(Files0) ->
  238:     Files = lists:sort(Files0),
  239:     S = "\n" ++
  240:         [filename:basename(F) ++
  241:              ":6:5: The variable _ can never match since previous clauses completely covered the type \n"
  242:          "          atom()\n" || F <- Files],
  243:     iolist_to_binary(S).
  244:
